phrs.translation: 我们不能仅凭着热情而用感情去代替政策

sentences.sentence: You mustn t talk to each other in class.
sentences.translation: 不许在课堂上互相说话。

sentences.sentence: When installing the mixer, you should miunimize diameter at shaft gland towards quaking magnitude. the mixer mustn ' s be counterclocked, otherwise it will drop.
